## Help Page - Swiss Quality Indicators

This document was designed to assist you in the use of the tool that shows the Socio-economic and fertility indicators for the Suicide of the year 1888.

### To begin

To start, choose from the menu on the left the indicator you want to view. 

![Menu de Opcoes](Menu de Opcoes.jpg)

The chosen indicator will be displayed in the panel to your right by plotting a histogram.

![Grafico](grafico.jpg)
